summary: The package supplies utilities to enforce execution time limits on code blocks or functions. It offers both signal‑based (using Unix SIGALRM) and thread‑based watchdog mechanisms, each provided as a context manager and a decorator that raise a custom timeout exception when the allowed duration is exceeded.
business_intent: Enable the application to prevent long‑running or hanging operations during security scanning by bounding execution time, thereby improving reliability, resource usage, and overall performance of the tool.
